title: Did my duo friend get banned?
body:
So, last night i played a couple of games with my duo buddy, we won 2 and then we lost 3. I guess he flamed kinda since the games honestly were kinda frustrating, even i said something once or twice, but nothing to get a ban for, since everyone was toxic, and he was flaming far less. Basically, when i woke up this morning and when i opened up League, i saw a message from him: "This was my last breath. I will not be available for a couple of days. Then if I'm going to play, we'll go further. " This looks really odd because he never puts much effort in his messages, because why would he, I get that, but this last message looked really "tidy" i don't know. He also doesn't know English and grammar very well so that was another reason this message looked really weird. 

Maybe its just me overreacting but I really care about him and i wanna know if there's such a thing. A message you automatically get when your friend gets a ban and you try to talk to him.

tl;dr My friend was a little toxic and later, I got a weird message from him and i want to know if there's an automatic response if your friend gets banned.
Thanks in advance!
 {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: There is no notification when people on your friend list gets punished.
That sounds more like a case of depression or a suicide attempt. Try to contact him if you have him on some instant messaging  system

> [{quoted}](name=Dying,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=pBe7dxOQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-12-25T09:10:11.233+0000)
>
> "This was my last breath. I will not be available for a couple of days. Then if I'm going to play, we'll go further."

Well that is a red flag. If you have him on skype or discord or anything you should try messaging him and asking if everything is alright.

That being said, you don't get notified if a friend gets punished, and if you did it definitely wouldn't be that.
